plot outline: Shrimathi is a 2011 Indian Kannada film, directed by V Ravi and produced by Shankar Gowda. The film stars Upendra, Priyanka Upendra, Celina Jaitley, Prem Chopra and Sayaji Shinde in lead roles. The film had musical score by Gantadi Krishna. Watch the full movie, Shrimathi, only on Eros Now.
